general_advisory: As per the extended range forecast of IMD, dry weather is likely to prevail over Odisha with varying minimum temperatures. Farmers are advised to provide irrigation, spraying, and operations in the morning or evening.

advisory: In transplanted rice, apply 35 kg urea per acre as first top dressing at 20-25 days after transplanting.
Use pheromone traps with lure for yellow stem borer and leaf folder management.
Spray Azadiractin neem seed kernel based EC formulation for pest control.
Use yellow sticky traps per acre for insect control in vegetative stage.
Apply neem oil per liter of water for insect control.
Spray imidacloprid or thiamethoxam for yellow mosaic virus control.
Use yellow sticky traps per acre for insect control in vegetative stage.
Apply neem oil per liter of water for insect control.
Spray imidacloprid or thiamethoxam for yellow mosaic virus control.
Regularly monitor Mango Hopper attack in orchard.
Avoid irrigation at flowering stage to reduce flower drop.
Manage mango mealy bug by wrapping polythene/alkathane sheet on trees.
Use Emamectin Benzoate for caterpillar and borer control in Tomato and Brinjal.
Spray Spinosad or Fipronil for Diamond Back Moth attack in Cauliflower.
Regularly monitor for sucking insect attack and purple blotch disease in Onion.
